txt.en: Sharpen Orkish blades in Cirith Ungol ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'Hoi, Silent One! Back at last, are you?'

You nod.

'Well, it's a good thing you are! I have a bunch of blades and axes that need sharpening, and the Orc that was going to do it never came back from the swamp.

'He's dead and you're not, so what do you say? Sharpen them up for me, will you?
Sharpen Orkish axes in Cirith Ungol ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Sharpened Orkish blades in Cirith Ungol ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Sharpened Orkish axes in Cirith Ungol ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Krúrglok anticipates that the Men of Gondor and Rohan shall soon venture into Lhingris, and he wants to be certain that Cirith Ungol is prepared to repel them.
You have sharpened many of the Orkish axes and blades in Cirith Ungol, while also carefully weakening their hilts.
Orkish blades and axes can be found within the Tower of Cirith Ungol.\n\nKrúrglok has asked you to sharpen Orkish blades and axes in anticipation of an attack by the Men of Gondor and Rohan.
As Krúrglok asked, you have sharpened many of the Orkish axes and blades in Cirith Ungol. However, you were also able to subtly weaken their hilts while sharpening them.
